title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 635-13.1 - Applicability and service definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 635-13.1 - Applicability and service definition

State Regulations
(a) This Subpart is applicable to independent
practitioner services for individuals with developmental disabilities (IPSIDD)
provided to individuals who meet the eligibility criteria specified in this

Subpart. (b) IPSIDD is a Medicaid

State plan service that consists of clinical services identified in subdivision
(c) of this section provided on and after April 1, 2016. (c) IPSIDD services include the following
clinical services that are not delivered as part of an individual's residential
and/or day habilitation service: (1)
occupational therapy; (2)
physical
therapy; (3)
speech and language
pathology; (4)
psychology; (5)
social
work. (d) Independent
practitioners must comply with the requirements of this Subpart to provide and
receive reimbursement for IPSIDD. Notes

comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
